Package mlsim.simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • mlsim.simulation.Simulation
  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulation is a class that represents a single simulation. Given its width and height, creates a plane with those dimensions. On this plane, organisms can move, eat, fight. Food per Agent is the number of food samples that will be placed randomly on a plane. Total number of food samples is calculated as follows: round(foodPerAgents x numAgents) A simulation also needs the solutions themselves to control the agents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        Simulation​(int width,
           int height,
           double foodPerAgent,
           java.util.List<GAWrapper> genotypes)
        Creates a new simulation with given parameters.
        Parameters:
        width - Width if the plane.
        height - Height of the plane.
        foodPerAgent - How many food samples will be created per agent.
        genotypes - Genotypes themselves that will dictate agent movement.

    • Method Detail

      • makeAgent

        protected Agent<GAWrapper> makeAgent​(GAWrapper genotype,
                                     int x,
                                     int y)
        A simple, 'overridable' method for creating a single agent.
        Parameters:
        genotype - Genotype of this agent.
        x - X position.
        y - Y position.
        Returns:
        An agent with these coordinates.

      • randomX

        protected int randomX()
        Chooses a random valid x position.

      • randomY

        protected int randomY()
        Chooses a random valid y position.

      • ended

        public boolean ended()
        Checks if this simulation ended (when all agents are removed).
        Returns:
        True if ended, false otherwise.

      • step

        public void step()
        Computes a single step of this simulation. A single step is composed of: - agent movement - taking care of out-of-bounds agents - fights (agents which lost are turned to food) - eating food (which includes dead agents turned to food) - removal of starved agents

      • finish

        public Results<GAWrapper> finish()
        A simple convenience method that automatically steps through this simulation until it has ended and returns the results.
        Returns:
        Results of this simulation.

      • getSimulationState

        public SimulationState getSimulationState()
        Returns the simulation state of this simulation. Changing state through this object is undefined behavior.
        Returns:
        SimulationState of this simulation.

      • getResults

        public Results<GAWrapper> getResults()
        Computes fitness and returns the results of this simulation. A program should not be able to get the results before the simulation has finished.
        Returns:
        Results of this simulation.

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns this simulation's plane width.
        Returns:
        Width of the plane.

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns this simulation's plane height.
        Returns:
        Height of the plane.

      • getSteps

        public int getSteps()
        Returns the number of steps this simulation had.
        Returns:
        Number of this simulation's steps.
